title: How Can I Reduce Network Traffic?
answer:
1、Disable the data service if you are not using it.
2、Disable the data service if a WLAN network is available.
3、Deselect Enable always-on mobile data when you enable the data service. For details, see section 3.6 "How Can I Reduce Traffic When I Am Roaming?"
4、On the main menu screen, select Settings > Accounts & sync, and then deselect Background data/Auto-sync.
